job.title: Sr Software Engineer (Support Coordinator)

system componentsliliUnit testing and functional testing of new functionalityliliSupport internal and external as required to address any questions or resolve any issues related to LexililiHelp onboard new Software Engineers to the teamliliReview of functional specifications and other validation deliverables as assignedbrbrliulstronguQualificationsbrustrongulliBachelors Degree in related field  Computer Science Math Or Masters Degreelili68 years prior related experience in developing frontend application backend micro services automating build and tests and deployment service using micro services architecturebrbrliulAt IQVIA we believe in pushing the boundaries of human science and data science to make the biggest impact possible  to help our customers create a healthier world The advanced analytics technology solutions and contract research services we provide to the life sciences industry are made possible by our 70000 employees around the world who apply their insight curiosity and intellectual courage every step of the way Learn more at jobsiqviacombrbrAll qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race color religion sex
